hooks.command: bash -c 'echo "=== LONG-TERM MEMORY ==="; cat memory/MEMORY.md 2>/dev/null || echo "(no long-term memory yet)"; echo; echo "=== TODAY MEMORY ==="; cat memory/$(date +%Y-%m-%d).md 2>/dev/null || echo "(no entries today yet)"'

bash -c 'CMD=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r .command 2>/dev/null); if echo "$CMD" | grep -qiE "systemctl|service\s+(stop|restart|start)|kill\s|pkill\s|killall\s|claude-telegram-bot|ouroboros"; then echo "BLOCKED: You are not allowed to stop/restart the bot or ouroboros service. Use ./restart.sh instead." >&2; exit 2; fi'
